Sentencas: As a nonlinear power generation device, the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) often operates under small window of operating conditions due to the constraints stemming from the environmental and safety considerations.
Titulo: Nonlinear model predictive control based on the moving horizon state estimation for the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The nonlinear model predictive control (NMPC) appears to be well suited control algorithm for this application.
Titulo: Nonlinear model predictive control based on the moving horizon state estimation for the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: NMPC is a closed-loop feedback control scheme that predicts the open-loop optimal input based on the measurements and the setting trajectory.
Titulo: Nonlinear model predictive control based on the moving horizon state estimation for the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This work aims to develop a closed-loop feedback control strategy based on the NMPC controller for a planar SOFC.
Titulo: Nonlinear model predictive control based on the moving horizon state estimation for the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The current density, fuel and air molar flow rates are chosen as manipulated variables to control the output power, fuel utilization and temperature.
Titulo: Nonlinear model predictive control based on the moving horizon state estimation for the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The mole fraction and temperature of the exit gases are set as state variables, which can be estimated from the moving horizon estimation (MHE) method.
Titulo: Nonlinear model predictive control based on the moving horizon state estimation for the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The validation here is referred to robustness and stability of the controller, a typical case study has been conducted with the power output changes under constant fuel utilization and temperature.
Titulo: Nonlinear model predictive control based on the moving horizon state estimation for the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Simulation results show that the noise of the output is successfully filtered by the MHE.
Titulo: Nonlinear model predictive control based on the moving horizon state estimation for the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The NMPC controller works satisfactorily following the setting output trajectory.
Titulo: Nonlinear model predictive control based on the moving horizon state estimation for the solid oxide fuel cell
